tool_description: Explore the literary world with "All About Books" API! This user-friendly tool offers quick access to comprehensive information about different published books from the past 100 years. Uncover details such as genre, author, publisher, book cover images, and more with just a few simple API calls. Perfect for book enthusiasts and developers alike!
name: All about Books
title: All about Books

api_list.name: Books by Title
api_list.description: Provides books with matching or partially matching title provided to API request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/book/All Hallows"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/book/{title}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Books by Publisher Name
api_list.description: Provides list of books published by a Publisher.

api_list.name: Books by Year
api_list.description: Provides a list of books published in a year. Data available from 1900 onwards.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/publish/2023"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Books by Author
api_list.description: Generates one or more books written by an Author provided in API request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/author/Veronica  Roth"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
